definitions.text: something that hinders as if with bonds

examples: Will this wallpaper adhere to the wall?
The grandparents want to bond with the child

definitions.text: make fast; tie or secure, with or as if with a rope
examples: The Chinese would bind the feet of their women

definitions.text: wrap around with something so as to cover or enclose
secure with or as if with ropes
examples: tie up the old newspapers and bring them to the recycling shed

definitions.text: bind by an obligation; cause to be indebted
examples: I'll hold you by your promise

definitions.text: fasten or secure with a rope, string, or cord
examples: They tied their victim to the chair
These foods tend to constipate you
